name: The Hunter (BoxOnaCat)
description:
Horror game about a hunter.

              Created by:   BoxOnaCat

Visual Sprite Work:   Elisabeth Sagaischek (GottderFruchte)

How did you choose to implement the Theme: Feral Beast in your game? 

A Hunter Should Hunt Beasts.

Did you implement any of the optional Bonus Challenges, and if so, which ones?

werewolf & beartrap.
